Location in Vietnam
VNU University of Engineering and Technology
(
VNU-UET
;
Vietnamese
:
Trường Đại học Công nghệ, Đại học Quốc gia Hà Nội
), or
Hanoi University of Engineering and Technology
, is a member of
Vietnam National University, Hanoi
(VNU). Established in 2004 from the Faculty of Technology, it has grown over the years into one of the top universities in Vietnam for Information Technology and Engineering majors.
